arguments.response_text: Hi, I just moved to Chicago last year and I planned and I'm now having my on having my graduate program in Chicago and I will graduate in this May. I'm quite um it's quite hard for me to decide whether or not I will keep living in America since I miss my home country and my family back in my homeland but on the other hand I also like the working atmosphere the culture the freedom so it is a hard choice for me but by now I like America and I maybe I hope more to work here for a while and then maybe I will come back to my homeland I'm not sure about that I hope I can find the answer soon okay thank you
arguments.response_summary: The response discusses the speaker's decision to stay in America after graduating from a graduate program in Chicago, balancing the desire to stay with the longing for their home country.
arguments.matched_prompt: How did you and your family build a life in Chicago?
